sections.heading: Issuance of license; renewal; inactive status; branch office license; application; fee6-904
sections.text: Issuance of license; renewal; inactive status; branch office license; application; feeA. The deputy director, on determining that the applicant is qualified and has paid the fees, shall issue a mortgage broke
